config_section.description: The section of the edgerc file to use for configuration

auth_grants_json.description: A user's per-group role assignments, in JSON form

contact_type.description: To help characterize the user, the value can be any that are available from the view-contact-types operation

country.description: As part of the user's location, the value can be any that are available from the view-supported-countries operation

enable_tfa.description: Indicates whether two-factor authentication is allowed

job_title.description: The user's position at your company

last_login.description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the user last logged in

password_expired_after.description: The date a user's password expires

preferred_language.description: The value can be any that are available from the view-languages operation

session_timeout.description: The number of seconds it takes for the user's Control Center session to time out if there hasn't been any activity

tfa_configured.description: Indicates whether two-factor authentication is configured

time_zone.description: The user's time zone. The value can be any that are available from the view-time-zones operation

user_name.description: A user's `loginId`. Typically, a user's email address

block.description: Manage a user in your account

contract_id.description: Contract ID to be assigned to the Property

group_id.description: Group ID to be assigned to the Property

hostnames.description: Mapping of edge hostname CNAMEs to other CNAMEs

name.description: Name to give to the Property (must be unique)

product_id.description: Product ID to be assigned to the Property

production_version.description: Property's version currently activated in production (zero when not active in production)

rule_format.description: Specify the rule format version (defaults to latest version available when created)

staging_version.description: Property's version currently activated in staging (zero when not active in staging)

block.description: Retrieve all contact types that Akamai supports
List all the possible countries that Akamai supports
List all groups in which you have a scope of "admin" for the current account and contract
Get roles for the current account and contract

country.description: Specifies a US state or Canadian province

block.description: List US states or Canadian provinces
List all the possible languages Akamai supports
Lists all session timeout policies Akamai supports

version.description: This is a computed value - provider will always use 'latest' version, providing own version number is not supported
